offerDetailsList.title: Taj Mahal Palace
offerDetailsList.availSteps:
•  Collect the offer from TCP App
  •   Click on ‘Book Now’ to start booking a room of your choice during valid offer period in the applicable hotel
  •   Offer is auto-applied at checkout page
offerDetailsList.termsandconditions:
•   Offer is applicable only on room booking from TCP App
  •  Points will be awarded to customer only post checkout
  •  This offer cannot be clubbed with any other existing offers
  •  The offer can be availed only once per user
  •  In case of booking cancellation, amount will be refunded to the customer via the same payment instrument used during purchase (no loyalty points will be awarded)
  •  Offer is subject to room availability and not valid on special events or black out dates
  •  TCP & IHCL reserve the rights to amend the T&C, end the offer, or call back any of the offers without prior notice
